name: Finding
description: The finding object describes the results of detections or analytics.

name.name: Name
name.description: The name of detections or analytics that produced the finding.

uid.name: UID
uid.description: The unique identifier of detections or analytics that produced the finding.

attacks.description: The array of attacks identified by the detections or analytics.

desc.description: The description of of detections or analytics that produced the finding.

observables.description: The observables associated with the findings.

users.description: The array of users identified by the detections or analytics.
